subject: Baseball
Free Agents (Sports)
lead_paragraph: Kenny Rogers is representing himself as a free agent, the Detroit Tigers confirmed yesterday. The move indicates that Rogers, a left-hander is closer to returning to Detroit and not letting the agent Scott Boras shop his services.
snippet: Kenny Rogers is representing himself as a free agent, the Detroit Tigers confirmed yesterday. The move indicates that Rogers, a left-hander is closer to returning to Detroit and not letting the agent Scott Boras shop his services.
